title: Top Places to visit in Thoothukudi, Tamil Nadu
content: Thoothukudi (also known as Tuticorin, the official name until 2018) is a port city and a municipal corporation and an industrial city in Thoothukudi district in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Tirupattur, Tamil Nadu
content: Tirupattur is a town and also the headquarter of Tirupattur district, India, one of the oldest places in Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Tiruvallur, Tamil Nadu
content: Tiruvallur district, also known as Thiruvallur District, is an administrative district in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. The fast developing city of Tiruvallur is the district headquarters. title: Top Places to visit in Tiruvarur, Tamil Nadu
content: Thiruvarur also spelled as Tiruvarur[a] is a town and municipality in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is the administrative headquarters of Tiruvarur district and Tiruvarur taluk. title: Top Places to visit in Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu
content: Tiruvannamalai (also Thiruvannamalai or Trinomali and Trinomalee during British times) is a town in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Vellore, Tamil Nadu
content: Vellore is a city and the administrative headquarters of Vellore District in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Viluppuram, Tamil Nadu
content: Viluppuram (also Villupuram or Vizhupuram) is one of the 37 districts that make up the state of Tamil Nadu, India. title: Top Places to visit in Virudhunagar, Tamil Nadu
content: Virudhunagar (also known as Virudupatti) is a town and the administrative headquarters of the Virudhunagar district in the South Indian state of Tamil Nadu. title: Top Places to visit in Adilabad, Telangana
content: Adilabad, a municipality, and the headquarters of Adilabad district, is a city in Adilabad district of the Indian state of Telangana. title: Top Places to visit in Komaram Bheem, Telangana
content: Komaram Bheem (22 October 1901 – 27 October 1940) was a tribal leader who fought against the Asaf Jahi Dynasty for the liberation of Hyderabad. content: Hyderabad District is a district in the state of Telangana in India that contains a part of the metropolitan area of Hyderabad.
